filmography.title: Alice Adams
filmography.role_description: A wealthy young man who falls for a small-town girl trying to rise above her social station; MacMurray's breakout role.
filmography.plot: A small-town girl tries to keep up social appearances to impress a wealthy young man.

filmography.title: The Gilded Lily
filmography.role_description: A newspaper reporter who helps his friend become a celebrity to spite a snobbish aristocrat, realizing he loves her along the way.
filmography.plot: A reporter helps a stenographer become famous to spite a snobbish aristocrat, but realizes he loves her himself.

filmography.title: Hands Across the Table
filmography.role_description: A penniless playboy who falls for a manicurist looking for a rich husband, leading to a comedic romance.
filmography.plot: A manicurist intent on marrying for money falls for a former millionaire who is also looking for a rich spouse.

filmography.title: The Trail of the Lonesome Pine
filmography.role_description: An engineer who comes to the Blue Ridge Mountains to build a railroad and gets caught in a deadly family feud.
filmography.plot: A family feud in the Blue Ridge Mountains is exacerbated by the arrival of a railroad engineer and the romance that ensues.

filmography.title: The Princess Comes Across
filmography.role_description: A concertina-playing bandleader who helps a woman posing as a Swedish princess solve a murder on an ocean liner.
filmography.plot: A Brooklyn girl poses as a princess to get into movies but gets mixed up in a murder mystery on an ocean liner.

filmography.title: Swing High, Swing Low
filmography.role_description: A talented trumpet player in Panama whose rise to fame and descent into alcoholism threatens his marriage.
filmography.plot: A shipboard romance between a trumpet player and a woman leads to marriage, but his career ambition drives them apart.

filmography.title: True Confession
filmography.role_description: An honest lawyer whose compulsive liar wife confesses to a murder she didn't commit to boost his career.
filmography.plot: A pathological liar confesses to a murder to boost her husband's legal career, claiming self-defense.

filmography.title: Remember the Night
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic prosecutor who takes a shoplifter home to his family for Christmas after her trial is postponed.
filmography.plot: A prosecutor takes a shoplifter home to his family for the holidays after her trial is postponed, and they fall in love.

filmography.title: Dive Bomber
filmography.role_description: A cynical naval flight commander who eventually helps a flight surgeon solve the problem of pilot blackouts.
filmography.plot: A crusading scientist fights to solve the problem of pilot blackout in the era of new high-speed aircraft.

filmography.title: Take a Letter, Darling
filmography.role_description: A struggling painter who takes a job as a male secretary to a high-powered female advertising executive.
filmography.plot: A female executive hires a male secretary to protect her from professional jealousy and romantic entanglements.

filmography.title: No Time for Love
filmography.role_description: A rough-and-tumble 'sandhog' digging a tunnel who clashes with and falls for a sophisticated photographer.
filmography.plot: A female photographer is assigned to cover the digging of a tunnel and falls for one of the mud-covered workers.

filmography.title: Above Suspicion
filmography.role_description: An American professor who, along with his new wife, is recruited to spy on the Nazis during their honeymoon in Europe.
filmography.plot: Newlyweds honeymooning in Europe are asked to spy on the Nazis for the British secret service.

filmography.title: Double Indemnity
filmography.role_description: An insurance salesman who is seduced by a femme fatale into plotting the murder of her husband; his definitive role.
filmography.plot: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of his claims adjuster.

filmography.title: Murder, He Says
filmography.role_description: A pollster who stumbles upon a family of homicidal hillbillies searching for hidden bank loot.
filmography.plot: A pollster looking for a missing colleague stumbles upon a family of backwoods murderers.

filmography.title: Captain Eddie
filmography.role_description: The famous WWI flying ace and industrialist, portrayed in a biopic recounting his life and survival at sea.
filmography.plot: The story of Eddie Rickenbacker, from his early love of machinery to becoming a WWI ace and surviving a plane crash in the Pacific.

filmography.title: The Egg and I
filmography.role_description: A city man who impulsively buys a chicken farm, dragging his reluctant wife into a life of rustic chaos.
filmography.plot: A newlywed couple buys a chicken farm, but the wife finds that farm life is not what she expected.

filmography.title: Singapore
filmography.role_description: A pearl smuggler who returns to Singapore to retrieve a hidden fortune and finds his long-lost lover suffering from amnesia.
filmography.plot: A pearl smuggler returns to Singapore to retrieve his stash and finds his former lover who doesn't remember him.

filmography.title: Family Honeymoon
filmography.role_description: A man who marries a widow and is forced to take her three mischievous children along on their honeymoon.
filmography.plot: A college professor marries a young widow and is forced to take her three children on their honeymoon to the Grand Canyon.

filmography.title: A Millionaire for Christy
filmography.role_description: A radio philosopher who inherits a fortune and is pursued by a secretary determined to marry a millionaire.
filmography.plot: A secretary goes to inform a radio personality that he has inherited a fortune, planning to marry him before he finds out.

filmography.title: The Caine Mutiny
filmography.role_description: A cynical, intellectual novelist and naval officer who instigates the mutiny against Captain Queeg but avoids responsibility.
filmography.plot: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the First Officer relieves him of command and faces court martial.

filmography.title: Pushover
filmography.role_description: A police detective who falls for a bank robber's girlfriend and plots to steal the loot for himself.
filmography.plot: A cop falls for a bank robber's girlfriend and decides to steal the money she is guarding.

filmography.title: Woman's World
filmography.role_description: A car company executive who invites three regional managers and their wives to New York to choose his replacement.
filmography.plot: The owner of a car company invites three regional managers and their wives to New York to decide who will be the new general manager.

filmography.title: The Rains of Ranchipur
filmography.role_description: A dissolute, alcoholic artist living in India who finds purpose during a catastrophic flood.
filmography.plot: An Englishwoman in India engages in an affair with a Hindu doctor as natural disasters strike.

filmography.title: The Shaggy Dog
filmography.role_description: A dog-hating mailman and father who is horrified when his son is transformed into a large sheepdog.
filmography.plot: A boy is cursed by an ancient ring that transforms him into a sheepdog at inconvenient times.

filmography.title: The Apartment
filmography.role_description: A powerful, adulterous corporate executive who exploits his employee's apartment for his affairs; a villainous turn.
filmography.plot: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

filmography.title: The Absent-Minded Professor
filmography.role_description: A brilliant but forgetful scientist who invents 'Flubber' (flying rubber), enabling his Model T to fly.
filmography.plot: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Special Effects; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actor

filmography.title: Son of Flubber
filmography.role_description: Reprising his role as the inventor of Flubber, now dealing with the IRS and experimenting with 'dry rain'.
filmography.plot: Professor Brainard's discovery of 'Flubber' hasn't brought him the riches he expected, and he faces new challenges with the IRS.

filmography.title: The Happiest Millionaire
filmography.role_description: An eccentric Philadelphia millionaire who runs a boxing Bible school in his home and keeps pet alligators; MacMurray's final feature film.
filmography.plot: An eccentric millionaire's household is turned upside down when his daughter gets engaged, leading to a clash of families.
